document.full_text: yemen's ruling party held open the possibility that president ali abdullah saleh would sign a deal on sunday that would soon ease him out of office as washington heaped pressure on the entrenched leader to transfer power.
document.title: yemen leadership may yet sign transition deal
lines_and_colors: yemen's ruling party held open the possibility that president ali abdullah saleh would sign a deal on sunday that would soon ease him out of office as washington heaped pressure on the entrenched leader to transfer power.
